name: Desktop CEO
description:
Desktop CEO is a short game modeled after Choose Your Own Adventure fiction. You are presented with memos, acquisitions, and messages that give you binary choices to make, and your decisions eventually lead you down different branches and towards various endings. 

The game has 8 major endings and 13 endings in total. It takes roughly 30 minutes to reach all the different endings. 

The game was made in a short amount of time with GameMaker Studio 2 as a prototype for a larger project.

Features: 

  • Alternate endings
  • Meaningful choices
  • Pixel graphics
  • Mouse-only controls

Fonts Used:

  • Dogica Pixel by Roberto Mocci

Hint:

  • Attempt to balance your decisions
